body:
I agree with Yaz. We don’t wanna push him out permanently maybe he’s just
going through one of his emotional phases.

On Sun, Jun 14, 2020 at 3:00 PM Yaz Khoury <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I don't think we should be removing @sorpaas <https://github.com/sorpaas>
> from the contributor list just because he announced he's not working
> specifically on ETC. He has many contributions and ideas to the space that
> warrant thinking more about these decisions than just hastily removing
> someone because they wrote a blog post.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/issues/325#issuecomment-643827811>,
> or unsubscribe
